mergewith.subtemplate: <distr spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Uniform"> <lower spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.0" estimate="false"/> <upper spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="1.0" estimate="false"/> </distr>

<distr spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Normal"> <mean spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.0" estimate="false"/> <sigma spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="1.0" estimate="false"/> </distr>

<distribution spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.LogNormal'> <M spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="1.0" estimate="false"/> <S spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="1.25" estimate="false"/> </distribution>

<distr spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Gamma"> <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="2.0" estimate="false"/> <theta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="2.0" estimate="false"/> </distr>

<distr spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Beta"> <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="2.0" estimate="false"/> <beta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="2.0" estimate="false"/> </distr>

<distr spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Laplace"> <mu spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.0" estimate="false"/> <scale spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="1.0" estimate="false"/> </distr>

<distr spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.TruncatedReal"> <param spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.0" estimate="false"/> <lower spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.0" estimate="false"/> <upper spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="1.0" estimate="false"/> <distribution spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Normal"> <mean spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.0" estimate="false"/> <sigma spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="1.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution> </distr>

<distr spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.TruncatedInt"> <param spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.IntScalarParam" domain="Int" value="0" estimate="false"/> <lower spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.IntScalarParam" domain="Int" value="0" estimate="false"/> <upper spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.IntScalarParam" domain="Int" value="1" estimate="false"/> <distribution spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Poisson"> <lambda spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="0.693" estimate="false"/> </distribution> </distr>

<distr spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.OffsetReal"> <param spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.0" estimate="false"/> <offset spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.0" estimate="false"/> <distribution spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Normal"> <mean spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.0" estimate="false"/> <sigma spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="1.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution> </distr>

<distr spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.OffsetInt"> <param spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.IntScalarParam" domain="Int" value="0" estimate="false"/> <offset spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.IntScalarParam" domain="Int" value="0" estimate="false"/> <distribution spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Poisson"> <lambda spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="0.693" estimate="false"/> </distribution> </distr>

<distr spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.InverseGamma"> <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="2.0" estimate="false"/> <beta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="2.0" estimate="false"/> </distr>

<distr spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.IID"> <param spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealVectorParam" dimension="2" domain="Real" lower="1.0E-9" upper="Infinity">1.0</param> <distr spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Uniform"> <lower spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="-1e307" estimate="false"/> <upper spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="1e307" estimate="false"/> </distr> </distr>
